subject: Brake pedal cable
description_text:
Hello Guys , I recently purchased a set of Simmson Plus.X pedals and I have an issue , the cable from the brake to the controller is intermittent.
I’ll attach a video explaining the issue.




Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text:
#SSN2238

Forgot to add the order number 

Regards
Sent from my iPhone

>

Hi Dejan Kotollaku,  Please provide a photo, as the video you uploaded is incomplete and cannot be opened. In addition, if only a few wires are broken, you can go to a nearby computer repair shop to have a new 4P4C RJ11 connector crimped. This may quickly restore functionality. Just keep the wiring order the same as before—it is the same as the throttle.
